newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Pacific Retail sets store opening plan.
newsitem.headline: Pacific Retail sets store opening plan.

text.p: Electrical goods retailer Pacific Retail Group Limited said on Friday it would invest heavily in store development and expansion in the current year.
In a statement managing director said the company wanted to upgrade and expand its network of stores "despite the difficult appliance retailing environment".
"In all, the group plans to open three megastores, five superstores, two appliance centres and four new Computer City stores this year," the statement added.
It noted that some of these would replace existing stores.
